markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Adaptive Mask Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=1104) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 101 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Magaambyan Attendant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=29)

**Prerequisites**
[Mask Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=1103)

</column>

---

Your mask familiar adapts quickly to material form, allowing it to gain more familiar and master abilities. You select four master and familiar abilities each day instead of two.
name: Adaptive Mask Familiar
